keyword: how many calories in soy sauce
title: How Many Calories Are in Soy Sauce?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in soy sauce per tablespoon, including sodium, carbs, protein, and variations for low-sodium or tamari options.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Soy Sauce?
assumptions: Regular soy sauce; 1 tbsp serving (≈16 g); no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (e.g., regular vs. low-sodium), and fermentation process. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of regular soy sauce contains about 8 calories and is high in sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp soy sauce?
faqs.a: About 8 calories per tablespoon of regular soy sauce.

faqs.q: Is soy sauce high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 1 tbsp has around 902 mg sodium—nearly 40% of daily recommended intake.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in soy sauce?
faqs.a: Approximately 1 g carbs per tbsp, with minimal fiber and sugars.
Typically 5-6 kcal per tbsp, with reduced sodium to about 500-600 mg.
Yes, about 1.3 g protein per tbsp from fermented soybeans.
